@attributes.name: imdbplot
@attributes.value: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation with his daughter's attractive friend.

@attributes.name: imdbactors
@attributes.value: Kevin Spacey|Annette Bening|Thora Birch|Wes Bentley|Mena Suvari|Chris Cooper|Peter Gallagher|Allison Janney|Scott Bakula|Sam Robards|Barry Del Sherman|Ara Celi|John Cho|Fort Atkinson|Sue Casey
